regular-body: I bought The Beatles Anthology on January 1, 2015. It’s now 53 minutes into January 3, and I’ve made it as far as A Day in the Life (which is right after the Strawberry Field takes), and it’s a little frightening just how much this music is written into my very being and how easy it is to just singing along with this stuff. And: I’m listening to 1967 song by a guy being nostalgic about the 1940s and ‘50s while myself becoming a bit nostalgic (or more accurately, whatever the opposite of nostalgia is) about when I first heard the song in 2000. And, oh, look, look, it’s Lucy in the Sky with Diamonds, one of the very first Beatles songs I ever fell in love with. Um. Yeah. Nice.
